Body: Recently FBI cannot unenscrypt a terrorist phone without iPhone help.http://www.cnet.com/news/iphone-apple-fbi-fight-11-juiciest-arguments-made-in-public-court-filings/Android devices often have full device enscryption.The only way anyone can read my data is if they know my PIN.Here is a problem. WHat about if it's rooted? Can it be compromised?In IPhone case, the phone cannot be compromized because only operating system signed with apple's private key can get there.I would imagine a jail broken or a rooted devices can flash any operating system on /system directory, and allow FBI to try 10k combinations of PIN.
Title: Can FBI descrypt my phone if I root it?

history.Text: Recently FBI cannot unenscrypt a terrorist phone without iPhone help.http://www.cnet.com/news/iphone-apple-fbi-fight-11-juiciest-arguments-made-in-public-court-filings/Android devices often have full device enscryption.The only way anyone can read my data is if they know my PIN.Here is a problem. WHat about if it's rooted? Can it be compromised?In IPhone case, the phone cannot be compromized because only operating system signed with apple's private key can get there.I would imagine a jail broken or a rooted devices can flash any operating system on /system directory, and allow FBI to try 10k combinations of PIN.
Can FBI descrypt my phone if I root it?
